body.transcript:
Hello, and thank you for contacting Melody Harmony Music School. My name is Patrick Hayes. May I know your name, please?

Hello Patrick, I'm Victoria Alexander.

Nice to meet you, Victoria. How can I assist you today? Is it about our product quality?

Yes, actually. I'm quite surprised by the quality of the piano classes I've attended.

Oh, could you please tell me more about what surprised you? Was it a positive or negative experience?

It was a very positive surprise! The instructor was incredibly skilled and patient.

That’s wonderful to hear! Could you let me know which level class you attended?

I attended the beginner level class.

Thank you for sharing, Victoria. Just to update our records, could you provide me with your preferred method of contact and your ZIP code?

Sure, my preferred method of contact is email, and my ZIP code is nine zero zero two seven.

Thank you, Victoria. We are thrilled to hear about your positive experience. If there is anything more you’d like to share or ask, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time!

Thank you, Patrick. I appreciate your help!
